constantValues: An Award Version represents a point in time snapshot of the attributes of an Award.

definitions.description: An Award Version represents a point in time snapshot of the attributes of an Award.

members.name: awardStartDate

constantValues: Date Award related Activities begin. Award may be won in June but related activities do not begin until July.

members.description: Date Award related Activities begin. Award may be won in June but related activities do not begin until July.

members.name: enrollmentStartDate

constantValues: Manually populated field on a Award record indicating when an Awardee may enroll in Award Activity.

members.description: Manually populated field on a Award record indicating when an Awardee may enroll in Award Activity.

members.name: name

constantValues: The name of the custom entity.

members.description: The name of the custom entity.

members.name: performanceMeasuresSummary

constantValues: Brief overview of performance measures as set by Awarder in contract agreement

members.description: Brief overview of performance measures as set by Awarder in contract agreement

foreignKeyAttribute.name: primaryContactId

constantValues: Brief overview of performance measures as set by Awarder in contract agreement

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Brief overview of performance measures as set by Awarder in contract agreement

members.name: reportingSchedule

constantValues: Manually populated,indicates the frequency that Award reports are scheduled to be disbursed as agreed in donor contract. These can include financial statements, narrative assessments, Impact reports,

members.description: Manually populated,indicates the frequency that Award reports are scheduled to be disbursed as agreed in donor contract. These can include financial statements, narrative assessments, Impact reports,
